info.title: LinkByte API
info.description: API for the LinkByte URL shortener

get.description: Get all links, with optional user filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Links Api Links  Get

get.description: Get link information by short code.
Resolve a short link to its original URL and track the click.

post.description: Verify password for a password-protected link.

get.description: Get all links for the authenticated user.
Get click statistics for a specific link.
Get geographic statistics for a specific link.
Get referrer statistics for a specific link.
Get analytics summary for a user.

schema.title: Response Get User Summary Api Analytics User  User Id  Summary Get

post.description: Login and get access token as HTTP-only cookie.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: Root endpoint to check if API is running.
